text.tspan: Catching up to the US during the golden age and beyond (1950–2018)
Unit 17 'The Great Depression, golden age, and global financial crisis’ Section 17.4 'The golden age of high growth and low
unemployment' in The CORE Team, The Economy. Available at https://tinyco.re/1704111 [Figure 17.11]
Note: GDP per hour relative to the US (US=100)
